resources.string: List of questions & answers and meaning of road signs
Test your knowledge without worrying about time
Time and question bound test exactly same as actual RTO test
Search and connect with driving schools around you
Language selection, forms, RTO office infromation and more

6.How can you distinguish a transport vehicle?
A.Stop the vehicle and wait till the pedestrains cross the road and then proceed
A.Take all reasonable steps to secure medical attention to the injured and report to the nearest police station within 24 hours
A. Should not drivein reverse gear
A.Through the right side of that vehicle

A.Should walk on the right side of the road"
No entry for cars and motorcycles
• Subject like Rules and Regulations of traffic, and traffic signage\'s are inclided in the test.
• 15 questions are asked in the at random, out of which 11 question are required to be answered correctiy to pass the test.
• 48 seconds are allowed to answer each question.
Q.The mandatory signs giving orders are mostly in....
Q.Motor cyclist usually cause hazard by.....
Q.While traveling over motorway at night with other vehicles just ahead,better the switched on lights should be...
Q.Motor cyclists usually cause hazard by....
passing very close toyou by driving in the zigzag manner
Q.you are driving on a well-lit motorway at night, you must...
use your headlight on high beam
always use your headlight in low beam
passing very close to you by driving in the zigzag manner

Application Form n n .In order to obtain a new driving license the applicant is required to obtain a learning license.n .For the purpose of both learning and driving licence, the applicant is required to apply in Form No. 2/4, also attaching a medical certificate in Form No. 1 (A). If the individual desires, obtain a driving license for a transport goods vehicle, and To book an appointment online or for more details, please visit:n eligibilityn A person must have completed 16 years to obtain a license for 2 wheelers without gear.n A person must have completed 18 years of age to obtain a license for 2 wheelers with gear, motor-cars, tractors and other non-transport vehicles.n For transport vehicles, a person should have completed 20 years. In addition he should have passed 8th standard and should have 1 year experience in driving a light motor vehicle.n Required Documentsn Proof of Agen School Leaving Certificate, Birth Certificate, Passport, PAN Card, L.I.C. Policy or Civil Surgeon or equivalent doctor\'s certificate can be submitted as proof of age.n Address Proofn Can be School Leaving Certificate, Passport, L.I.C. Policy, Electoral Voter I-Card, Light Bill, Telephone Bill, House Tax Receipt with address, Central/State/Local Government pay-slip or an affidavit to that effect from the applicant. For Address Submitted as evidence.n feen Fee for learning license and driving license to be paid together. Rs. 25/- as test fee plus Rs. 30/- per category of vehicle to be paid for learning license.n Rs. 200/- for smart card driving license and Rs. 50/- for driving license per vehicle category.n Examination Processn To obtain a learning license, a computer-based knowledge test is required.n Subjects like traffic rules and regulations and traffic signage are covered in the test.n The exam consists of 15 questions randomly asked, of which 11 questions are required to pass the exam.n You have 48 seconds to answer each question.n A person who fails the test can appear for the test again after an interval of 24 hours.n A person who holds a learning license or a driving license and wishes to apply for an additional category of driving license to the existing driving licence, is exempted from the computer-based knowledge test.n

"To add another category to the existing license for two wheelers For driving license Rs. 50/- Application should be made in Form-8 for attaching original driving license, for smart card driving license Rs. 200/- and for driving test Rs. 50/- fee has to be paid. Pay with the app. The applicant is required to obtain a learning license, but is exempted from the computer knowledge test. The applicant can appear for the driving test after an interval of 30 days after obtaining the learning license. L.M.V. Addition of transport vehicle category to licence Application is made in Form No. 8 and original driving license is required to be attached. Applicant must have completed 20 years. Minimum standard 8 pass, and L.M.V. Having at least 1 year of driving experience The applicant should also produce a training certificate from a recognized motor driving school in Form No. 5. For Smart Card Rs. 200/- for driving license with Rs. 50/- per vehicle category and Rs. 50/- driving test fee is required to be paid along with the application. Please note, the applicant is required to take a learning license, but is exempted from the computer knowledge test. To obtain a badge or authorization for a transport vehicle Application form T.V.A. should be done in The applicant must have completed 20 years and must have passed minimum standard-8th, and L.M.V. Having at least 1 year of driving experience The applicant should also produce a training certificate in No. 5 from an authorized motor driving school. He should also produce a good conduct certificate from the concerned police station. For this purpose for each category of vehicle Rs. A fee of 50/- is required to be paid Inclusion of category of dangerous goods in transport driving licence Application can be made on a plain paper showing the details of the applicant. Application should be accompanied by 3 days training certificate from center or center recognized by state government. For endorsement Rs. 50/- fee has to be paid. The endorsement is made for a period of one year. "

The driving license is valid till the date mentioned in the driving licence. A grace period of 30 days is given to renew the driving license. If the driving license holder comes for renewal within 5 years from the date of expiry, he is exempted from the test, but the license is valid from the date of renewal. Application for renewal of driving license should be made in Form-9 attached with the original driving license. If the applicant has completed the age of 50 years or has applied for renewal of driving license for a transport vehicle, a medical certificate in Form-1-A is required to be produced. If Rs. 200/- with smart card fee of Rs. A fee of 50/- has to be paid, if applied within the period. For delay, for every year of such delay Rs. An additional fee of 50/- has to be paid. If Original Driving License other R.T.O. or State, N.O.C of concerned R.T.O. should be attached.
Application should be made in form L.L.D. Along with original driving license details and Rs. A fee of 200/- has to be paid.

" To obtain an International Driving Licence, an application in Form 4 (A) should be made along with a medical certificate in Form - 1 (A). Copy of current driving license. Passport, visa and three passport size photos have to be attached with the application. For this purpose Rs. A fee of 500/- is required to be paid. The permit is issued for a period of one year or until the validity of the existing driving license, whichever is earlier. Duplicate International Driving Permits are not issued or renewed after expiry. International Driving Permits are not renewed once they expire. It should be noted that, such license is issued only to Indian citizens and they are issued by R.T.O. It is necessary to present in person."

The learning license is delivered to the applicant in person on the same day he/she appears for the knowledge test. The driving license is sent by speed post to the address mentioned by the applicant in his application. The International Driving Permit is issued to the applicant in person.
Addition of another category to the existing driving license
To change or duplicate driving license details

This test is only for public awareness. THough all Efforts have been made to ensure the accurancyof the content, the same should not be construed as a statement of law or used for any legal purposses. This application accepts no responsibility in relation to the accurancy,completeness, usefulness or otherwise,ofthe contents.Usersare advised to verify/ check any information with the Transport Department.
If you are the owner of a driving school, or if you are ausre who\'s discovered a driving school not listed on Rto Exam, let us know filling this form.
No question is bookmarked.Click on \'Bookmark\' icon next to question to save it for later.
